content: this sock is knitted top down in 2 colors with fingering weight yarn and us size 1 needles 2 25mm the sample in the pattern is size medium knitted with cascade heritage as the main color and malabrigo sock as the contrast color the length is customizable these sizes are based on width small us women s size 5 and below children medium us women s size 6 to 10 us men s size 8 and below large us women s size 11+ us men s size 9+ the required amount of yarn depends on the length of the sock but for ankle length socks i estimate small cc - 80yds mc - 250yds medium cc - 120yds mc - 300yds large cc - 150yds mc - 350 yds i haven t knitted the smallest size yet so the corresponding shoe sizes listed in the pattern for that size are an estimate
